head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Correction Officer Is Shot

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Correction Officer Is Shot

body.head.byline: By Thomas J. Lueck (NYT) (Compiled by Anthony Ramirez)

abstract.p: Unidentified off-duty correction officer is shot in dispute that erupted at soccer game in Linden Park in East New York section of Brooklyn (S)

block.p: An off-duty correction officer was shot in the stomach last night in a dispute that erupted about 9 p.m. after a soccer game in an East New York park. The victim, whose name was not disclosed, was taken to Brookdale Hospital Medical Center. Dozens of police officers searched the area for a man who was believed to have dropped a red bag after shooting the correction officer. The officer was among more than 1,000 spectators at the soccer game in Linden Park.
